body:
Cool. I was about to revert too. I removed all the warnings from dalli but
we need to wait for a release or use with bundler

Rafael Mendonça França
On Aug 31, 2012 11:56 AM, "Jon Leighton" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @rafaelfranca <https://github.com/rafaelfranca> @spastorino<https://github.com/spastorino>
> @guilleiguaran <https://github.com/guilleiguaran> @arunagw<https://github.com/arunagw>guys, I have reverted this because there was a test failing. please get it
> working in a branch before merging to master [image: :heart:]
>
> I also noticed that there were quite a lot of warnings generated by dalli
> - would be good to get those sorted too.
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub<https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/7452#issuecomment-8194560>.
>
>
